entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 5:03 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 30%
